title: Stellantis CEO says automaker is stronger together as stock plummets amid $26 billion charge
summary_full: The automaker announced $26 billion in charges from a business restructuring that includes pulling back on electrification plans and reintroducing V8 engines.
summary_public: The automaker announced $26 billion in charges from a business restructuring that includes pulling back on electrification plans and reintroducing V8 engines.
